description: This simple avocado and tomato salad is a chunky mix of all of summer's fresh flavors, like tomato, avocado, lime, and cilantro.
keywords: avocado and tomato, avocado salad, guacamole salad, Tomato Salad
name: Avocado and Tomato Salad

recipeInstructions.text: Dice the avocados and tomatoes. Finely dice the red onion and jalapeño (seeds removed). Mince the garlic, and roughly chop the cilantro.

Add the avocados, tomatoes, jalapeño, red onion, garlic, and cilantro to a large bowl. Drizzle the olive oil over top. Juice the lime and add about 1 Tbsp to the salad to start, along with 1/4 tsp salt.

Give the salad a brief stir, then taste and add more lime juice and salt to your liking. I ended up using 2 Tbsp lime juice total and 1/2 tsp salt. Enjoy immediately or refrigerate until ready to serve.
